title: Bird Among the Flowers
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Mark

center of R ed center of R edge, black ink
description: small songbird perched on blossoming branch with pink blossoms; branch extends from URC to LLC; bird is situated near URC; small inscription along R edge in black ink
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
